title: Search Advertising Campaign Entity
description: Search Advertising Campaign contains common Search Advertising Attributes along with custom fields specific to Campaign setup on the Search Advertising Platforms.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Internal Account Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Internal account identifier which maps to a client account on search advertising platform.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Portfolio Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Internal Portfolio Identifer if any assigned for managing Search Advertising Campaign. Campaign can have at the most one portfolio assigned.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Budget Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Budget Type indicates how the allocated budget will be spent

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Ad Delivery Method
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Ad Delivery method can determine how long your budget lasts

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Objective
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Campaign Objective indicates the primary objective of the campaign - e.g. Promotions, Brands, App Installs.
